101.name: First Formation!
101.desc: Have 2 ships in your main fleet.

102.name: Form a Destroyer Squadron!
102.desc: Have 4 DD in your main fleet.

103.name: Form a Torpedo Squadron!
103.desc: Have a CL as a flagship and 5 DD in your main fleet.

104.name: Form a Six Ship Fleet!
104.desc: Have 6 ships in your main fleet.

105.name: Form a Squadron with Two CL!
105.desc: Have 2 CL in your main fleet.

106.name: Form a Heavy Cruiser Squadron!
106.desc: Have 2 CA in your main fleet.

107.name: Form a Carrier Task Force!
107.desc: Have a CV/CVL as a flagship and 3 DD in your main fleet.

108.name: Form the Tenryuu-class!
108.desc: Have Tenryuu (天龍) and Tatsuta (龍田) in your main fleet.

109.name: Form the Sendai-class!
109.desc: Have Sendai (川内), Jintsuu (神通) and Naka (那珂) in your main fleet.

110.name: Form the Myoukou-class!
110.desc: Have Myoukou (妙高), Nachi (那智), Ashigara (足柄) and Haguro (羽黒) in your main fleet.

111.name: Form the Fusou-class!
111.desc: Have Fusou (扶桑) and Yamashiro (山城) in your main fleet.

112.name: Form the Ise-class!
112.desc: Have Ise (伊勢) and Hyuuga (日向) in your main fleet.

113.name: Form the Main Fleet with BB and CA!
113.desc: Have a BB and 2 CA in your main fleet.

114.name: Form the Nagumo Task Force!
114.desc: Have ONLY Akagi (赤城), Kaga (加賀), Hiryuu (飛龍) and Souryuu (蒼龍) in your main fleet.

115.name: Form the Second Fleet!
115.desc: Have a flagship in your second fleet.

116.name: Ready a Seaplane Tender
116.desc: Have an AV in your main fleet.

117.name: Form a Carrier Task Force in the Second Fleet!
117.desc: Have a CV/CVL and 3 DD in your second fleet.

118.name: Form the Kongou-class!
118.desc: Have Kongou (金剛), Hiei (比叡), Haruna (榛名) and Kirishima (霧島) in your main fleet.

119.name: Form the Mikawa Fleet!
119.desc: Have Choukai (鳥海), Aoba (青葉), Kako (加古), Furutaka (古鷹), Tenryuu (天龍) and a FAST speed ship in your main fleet.

120.name: Form the Destroyer Division 6!
120.desc: Have ONLY Akatsuki (暁), Hibiki (響), Inazuma (雷) and Ikazuchi (電) in your main fleet.

121.name: Form the Cruiser Division 4!
121.desc: Have Atago (愛宕), Takao (高雄), Choukai (鳥海) and Maya (摩耶) in your main fleet.

122.name: Form the Nishimura Fleet!
122.desc: Have Fusou (扶桑), Yamashiro (山城), Mogami (最上) and Shigure (時雨) in your main fleet.

123.name: Form the Carrier Division 5!
123.desc: Have Shoukaku (翔鶴), Zuikaku (瑞鶴) and 2 DD in your main fleet.

124.name: Form the New Mikawa Fleet!
124.desc: Have Choukai (鳥海), Aoba (青葉), Kinugasa (衣笠), Kako (加古), Furutaka (古鷹) and Tenryuu (天龍) in your main fleet.

125.name: Form a Submarine Fleet!
125.desc: Have 2 SS in your main fleet.

126.name: Form a Naval Aviation Strike Fleet!
126.desc: Have 2 BBV and 2 CAV in your main fleet.

127.name: Form a Medium-Sized Submarine Fleet!
127.desc: Have 3 SS in your main fleet.

128.name: Form the Cruiser Division 6!
128.desc: Have Furutaka (古鷹), Kako(加古), Aoba (青葉) and Kinugasa (衣笠) in your main fleet.

129.name: Form the 5th Fleet!
129.desc: Have Nachi (那智), Ashigara (足柄), Tama (多摩), and Kiso (木曾) in your fleet.

130.name: Form the Torpedo Squadron 1!
130.desc: Have Abukuma (阿武隈), Akebono (曙), Ushio (潮), Kasumi (霞) and Shiranui (不知火) in your fleet.

131.name: Form the Destroyer Division 8!
131.desc: Have Asashio (朝潮), Michishio (満潮), Ooshio (大潮) and Arashio (荒潮) in your fleet.

132.name: Form the Destroyer Division 18!
132.desc: Have ONLY Kasumi (霞), Arare (霰), Kagerou (陽炎) and Shiranui (不知火) in your fleet.

133.name: Form the Destroyer Division 30 (Gen-1)!
133.desc: Have ONLY Mutsuki (睦月), Kisaragi (如月), Yayoi (弥生) and Mochizuki (望月) in your fleet.

134.name: In Preparation of Love! (Part 3)
134.desc: Organize your feelings and deploy your fleet with a high level flagship (Lv.90~99)!

135.name: Journey Anew!
135.desc: Organize a fleet of 6 ships with your newly bonded ship of Lv.100 or more as flagship!

136.name: Form the 30th Destroyer Fleet (Gen.2)
136.desc: Have only Mutsuki (睦月), Yayoi (弥生), Uzuki (卯月) and Mochizuki (望月) in your fleet.

137.name: Form the 5th Fleet
137.desc: Have Myoukou (妙高), Nachi (那智) and Haguro (羽黒) in your fleet.

138.name: Form the new 2nd Carrier Division
138.desc: Have Hiryuu Kai Ni (飛龍改二, as the flagship), Souryuu (蒼龍) and 2 destroyers in your fleet.

139.name: Form the 6th Submarine Fleet
139.desc: Have a submarine tender and 4 (or more) submarines in your fleet.

140.name: Test the new RADAR!
140.desc: Have Myoukou Kai2 as the flagship of your fleet.

141.name: Reorganise the Strengthened 2nd Carrier Division
141.desc: Have Souryuu Kai-2 (蒼龍改二) as flagship with Hiryuu Kai-2 (飛龍改二) and 2 destroyers in your fleet.

142.name: Organise the Elite 3rd Battleship Division
142.desc: Have all four Kongou-class Kai 2 battleships in your main fleet.

143.name: Deploy a New Standard Aircraft Carrier
143.desc: Have Unryuu (雲龍) as your flagship.

144.name: Organise the Main Battleship Fleet: the 2nd Squadron
144.desc: Have both Nagato-class and both Fusou-class battleships (and no other ships) in your main fleet.

145.name: Organise the Main Battleship Force
145.desc: Have three battleships of Nagato, Fusou, Ise or Yamato classes and a light cruiser in your fleet.

146.name: Prepare the Arsenal for Renovations
146.desc: Have Akashi (明石) as your flagship in your main fleet.

147.name: Organise the Nishimura Fleet
147.desc: Have Fusou (扶桑), Yamashiro (山城), Mogami (最上), Shigure (時雨) and Michishio (満潮) in your main fleet.

148.name: Organise the Counterattack Squadron
148.desc: Have Kasumi (霞) as the flagship, Ashigara (足柄), 1 CL and 3 more DDs in your main fleet.

149.name: Organise the 11th Destroyer Division
149.desc: Have the 4 Special-type destroyers: Fubuki (吹雪), Shirayuki(白雪), Hatsuyuki (初雪) and Murakumo(叢雲) in your main fleet. One of them should be the flagship.

150.name: Organise the 21st Destroyer Division
150.desc: Have only Hatsuharu (初春), Nenohi (子日), Wakaba (若葉) and Hatsushimo (初霜) in your main fleet.

151.name: Organise the 22nd Destroyer Division
151.desc: Have only Satsuki (皐月), Fumizuki (文月), Nagatsuki (長月) and 1 more DD in your main fleet.

152.name: Organise the New Edition of the Mikawa Fleet
152.desc: Have Choukai Kai2 as the flagship and any five of Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu, Yuubari in your main fleet

153.name: Reorganize the 18th Squadron!
153.desc: Have Tenryuu, Tatsuta and 2 or more other ships in your fleet

154.name: Organize the surface attack fleet!
154.desc: Have Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi, Inazuma in your fleet

155.name: Organize the new 6th Destroyer Division!
155.desc: Have Akatsuki Kai2 as Flagship with Hibiki/Bep, Ikazuchi, Inazuma in your fleet

156.name: 1st Torpedo Squadron, Prepare for a Rush to the Northern Sea
156.desc: Have Abukuma as flagship with Hibiki/Вер, Hatsushimo, Wakaba, Samidare and Shimakaze in your main fleet

157.name: 1st Torpedo Squadron, Prepare for Another Rush to the Northern Sea
157.desc: Have Abukuma Kai Ni as flagship with Hibiki/Вер, Yuugumo, Naganami, Akigumo and Shimakaze in your main fleet

202.name: First Sortie!
202.desc: Deploy your main fleet on a combat mission.

203.name: Protect the Seas of Chinju-Fu!
203.desc: Deploy to World 1-1 and clear the stage.

204.name: Sortie to the Coast of Nansei Islands!
204.desc: Deploy to World 1-2 and clear the stage.

205.name: Intercept Approaching Enemy Vanguard Fleet!
205.desc: Deploy to World 1-2 after defeating its boss and clear the stage.

206.name: Sortie the Torpedo Squadron!
206.desc: Deploy a fleet with a CL as flagship and 3 DD as escorts.

207.name: Sortie a Heavy Cruiser!
207.desc: Deploy a fleet with a CA as its flagship.

208.name: Sortie a Battleship!
208.desc: Deploy a fleet with a BB as its flagship. BBV don't count.

209.name: Sortie a Carrier Task Force!
209.desc: Deply a fleet with CV(L) as flagship and 5 DD/CL/AV for the escorts.

215.name: Second Fleet Sortie!
215.desc: Deploy your 2nd Fleet on a combat mission.

219.name: Sortie the Mikawa Fleet!
219.desc: Deploy a fleet with Choukai, Aoba, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu and another fast ship.

222.name: Sortie the Destroyer Division 6!
222.desc: Deploy a fleet with ONLY Akatsuki, Hibiki, Inazuma, and Ikazuchi.

223.name: Sortie the Cruiser Division 4!
223.desc: Deploy a fleet with Atago, Takao, Choukai, Maya and any 2 ships. Score a victory against World 2-2 Boss.

224.name: Sortie the Nishimura Fleet!
224.desc: Deploy a fleet with Fusou, Yamashiro, Mogami, Shigure and any 2 ships. Score a victory against World 2-3 Boss.

225.name: Sortie the Carrier Division 5!
225.desc: Deploy a fleet with Shoukaku, Zuikaku and any 4 ships. Score a victory against World 3-1 Boss.

227.name: Sortie the New Mikawa Fleet!
227.desc: Deploy a fleet with Choukai, Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka and Tenryuu. Score a victory against World 2-3 Boss.

231.name: Sortie a Submarine Fleet!
231.desc: Deploy a fleet with 2 SS and 4 additional ships. Score a victory against World 2-3 Boss.

232.name: Sortie a Naval Aviation Strike Fleet!
232.desc: Deploy a fleet with 2 BBV, 2 CAV and 2 additional ships. Score a victory against World 4-2 Boss.

233.name: Sortie the Cruiser Division 6!
233.desc: Deploy a fleet with Furutaka, Kako, Kinugasa, Aoba and 2 additional ships. Score a S rank victory against World 2-3 Boss.

239.name: Sortie the Destroyer Division 8!
239.desc: Deploy a fleet with Asashio, Michishio, Ooshio, Arashio and 2 additional ships. Score a victory against World 2-3 Boss.

240.name: Sortie the Destroyer Division 18!
240.desc: Deploy a fleet with Kasumi, Arare, Kagerou, Shiranui and 2 additional ships. Score a victory against World 3-1 Boss.

244.name: Deploy the Destroyer Division 30 (Gen-1)
244.desc: Deploy a fleet that consists of Mutsuki (睦月), Kisaragi (如月), Yayoi (弥生), Mochizuki (望月) and up to 2 additional DDs to world 3-2 and encounter the boss. C rank or above is required.

245.name: In Preparation of Love! (Final)
245.desc: Deploy a fleet with a high level (Lv.90~99) flagship to 2-3 obtain an S rank victory against the boss.

246.name: Your First Mission Together!
246.desc: Deploy a fleet to 4-3 with a bonded ship of Lv.100 or more as flagship and score an S rank victory against the boss.

247.name: Sortie an aviation battleship fleet!
247.desc: Have 2 BBV ships in your main fleet and score a victory against World 4-4 Boss.

248.name: 30th Destroyer Fleet's Anti-Submarine Patrol
248.desc: Deploy Mutsuki, Yayoi, Uzuki and Mochizuki to World 1-5 and reach the boss, scoring at least a C rank.

250.name: Deploy the 2nd Carrier Division
250.desc: Deploy Hiryuu Kai Ni (飛龍改二) as the flagship, Souryuu (蒼龍) and two destroyers to World 5-2. You may add 2 other ships. Score an S rank victory against the boss.

251.name: Deploy the Elite 2nd Carrier Division
251.desc: Deploy Souryuu Kai Ni (蒼龍改二) as the flagship, Hiryuu Kai Ni (飛龍改二) and two destroyers to World 4-3. You may add 2 other ships. Score an S rank victory against the boss.

252.name: Deploy a Haruna-led Fleet
252.desc: Deploy a fleet with Haruna Kai Ni (榛名改二) as the flagship and up to 5 additional ships to World 5-1 and score an S rank victory against the boss.

253.name: Deploy the 601 Air Group
253.desc: Deploy a fleet with Unryuu Kai (雲龍改) as the flagship to World 5-2 and score an S rank victory against the boss.

254.name: Deploy a Light Carrier Squadron
254.desc: Sortie a fleet of 1-2 light aircraft carriers, 1 light cruiser and 3-4 destroyers to World 2-1 and score an S rank victory against the boss.

255.name: Deploy a Torpedo Squadron to Bashi Islands
255.desc: Sortie a fleet of 1-2 light cruisers (with one of them as the flagship) and 4-5 destroyers to World 2-2. Score a victory at the boss and sink the enemy flagship.

258.name: Sortie the 2nd Squadron
258.desc: Deploy Nagato (長門), Mutsu (陸奥), Fusou (扶桑), Yamashiro (山城) and up to 2 additional ships to World 4-2. Score two S rank victories at the boss node.

260.name: Deploy the Battleship Squadron in the Northern Waters
260.desc: Deploy two battleships, a light aircraft carrier and up to three additional ships to World 3-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

262.name: Deploy the Nishimura Fleet in the Southern Waters
262.desc: Deploy Fusou (扶桑), Yamashiro (山城), Mogami (最上), Shigure (時雨) and Michishio (満潮) (you may also add another ship) to World 5-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

263.name: Deploy the Sixth Squadron to the Southwestern Waters
263.desc: Deploy Furutaka (古鷹), Kako (加古), Aoba (青葉), Kinugasa (衣笠) and up to two additional ships to World 2-5 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

267.name: Deploy the 11th Destroyer Division
267.desc: Deploy Fubuki (吹雪), Shirayuki(白雪), Hatsuyuki (初雪), Murakumo(叢雲) and up to 2 additional ships to World 2-3 and score a victory at the boss node.

268.name: 11th Destroyer Division's Anti-Submarine Patrol
268.desc: Deploy Fubuki (吹雪), Shirayuki(白雪), Hatsuyuki (初雪) and Murakumo(叢雲) to World 1-5 and get a score of at least C at the boss node.

269.name: Deploy the 21st Destroyer Division
269.desc: Deploy Hatsuharu (初春), Nenohi (子日), Wakaba (若葉) and Hatsushimo (初霜) and up to 2 additional ships to World 3-1 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

270.name: Deploy the 22nd Destroyer Division
270.desc: Deploy Satsuki (皐月), Fumizuki (文月), Nagatsuki (長月), 1 more DD and up to two additional ships to World 1-4 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

271.name: Deploy Nachi's Squadron
271.desc: Sortie a fleet with Nachi (那智) as flagship, Hatsushimo (初霜), Kasumi (霞), Ushio (潮), Akebono (曙) and one additional ship to world 2-2 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

272.name: Deploy the Remodelled Anti-Aircraft Heavy Cruiser
272.desc: Sortie a fleet with Maya (摩耶) Kai or Kai2, 1 CL, 2 DD and up to two additional ships to World 2-3 and score an S rank victory at the boss node.

273.name: Deploy the Mikawa Fleet to Solomon Islands
273.desc: Sortie the main fleet with Choukai Kai2 as the flagship and any five of Aoba, Kinugasa, Kako, Furutaka, Tenryuu, Yuubari to 5-1 and S-Rank the boss

274.name: 6th Destroyer Division's Anti-Submarine Patrol
274.desc: Deploy Akatsuki, Hibiki (響 or Верный), Inazuma and Ikazuchi to 1-5. C-Rank+ the boss

275.name: Deploy the 18th Squadron
275.desc: Tenryuu, Tatsuta, and at least 2 other ships to [W2-3] and S-rank the boss node

276.name: Sortie the surface attack fleet!
276.desc: Sortie Hiei, Kirishima, Nagara, Akatsuki, Ikazuchi, Inazuma to 5-1 and clear the map with an S-rank

277.name: DesDiv6 Anti-Submarine Mission!
277.desc: Sortie Akatsuki Kai2 , Hibiki/Verniy, Ikazuchi, Inazuma to 1-5 and clear the map with at least A-rank

278.name: Rush the 1st Torpedo Squadron to Operation KE
278.desc: Sortie Abukuma as flagship with Hibiki/Вер, Hatsushimo, Wakaba, Samidare and Shimakaze to 3-2 and B-Rank+ the boss

279.name: Rush the 1st Torpedo Squadron to Operation KE Again
279.desc: Sortie Abukuma Kai-2 as flagship with Hibiki/Вер, Yuugumo, Naganami, Akigumo and Shimakaze to 3-2 and B-Rank+ the boss

216.name: Daily Sortie 2
216.desc: Defeat the flagship of an abyssal fleet

226.name: Daily Sortie 7
226.desc: Defeat 5 bosses in horned nodes in World 2

214.name: Weekly Sortie 1
214.desc: Sortie 36x, Encounter 24 bosses, Win vs 12 bosses, 6 S-ranks

229.name: Weekly Sortie 6
229.desc: Defeat 12 bosses in horned nodes in World 4

243.name: Weekly Sortie 9
243.desc: Sortie to [W5-2] and S-rank the boss node 2 times

261.name: Weekly Sortie 10
261.desc: Sortie to [W1-5] and A-rank+ the boss node 3 times

249.name: Deploy the Fifth squadron
249.desc: Deploy Myoukou, Nachi, Haguro, +3 ships to [W2-5]. S-rank the boss node

256.name: Deploy a Submarine Fleet to World 6-1
256.desc: Deploy to [W6-1] and obtain an S-rank the boss node 3 times

257.name: Deploy a Torpedo Squadron
257.desc: 1~3 CL (CL flagship) and 3~5 destroyers to [W1-4]. S-rank the boss node

259.name: Deploy a Battleship Squadron
259.desc: Deploy 3 BB(V) + 1 CL + 2 ships to [W5-1] and S-rank the boss node

265.name: Monthly Escort Duty
265.desc: Deploy a fleet to [W1-5] and A-rank+ the boss node 10 times

264.name: Sortie the Aircraft Carrier Task Force to the West
264.desc: 2 CV + 2 DD + 2 ships to [W4-2]. S-rank the boss node

266.name: Deploy the Counterattack Squadron
266.desc: 4 DD (DD flagship) + 1 CA (Not CAV) + 1 CL to [W2-5] and S-rank the boss node

301.name: First Exercise!
301.desc: Challenge another fleet in practice mode

303.name: Daily Exercises 1
303.desc: Challenge 3 other fleets in practice mode

304.name: Daily Exercises 2
304.desc: Get 5 victories in practice mode within the same day

307.name: Improve the Efficiency of the Fleet
307.desc: Get 3 victories in practice mode within the same day

308.name: Improve the Efficiency of the Fleet One More Time
308.desc: Get 4 victories in practice mode within the same day

309.name: Strive to Increase the Level of Training in Preparation for Another Rush to the Northern Sea
309.desc: Get 4 victories in Exercises within the same day

409.name: Strategy Meeting with Overseas Submarine Dispatch!

412.name: Strengthen the Operation of the BBV

411.name: Weekly Expedition 3
411.desc: (Weekly) Complete expedition 37 or 38 a total of 7 times

413.name: Strengthen the Operation of the BBV (Cont.)

605.name: Daily Development 1
605.desc: Craft a piece of equipment (Failures are OK)

607.name: Daily Development 2
607.desc: Craft 3 pieces of equipment (Failures are OK)

614.name: Model Conversion (to Tenzan)
614.desc: Have flagship equipped with Type 97 Torpedo Bomber (Tomonaga Squadron), then scrap 2 Tenzan

615.name: Model Conversion (to Suisei)
615.desc: Have flagship equipped with Type 99 Dive Bomber (Egusa Squadron), then scrap 2 Suisei

616.name: Model Conversion (to Reppuu)
616.desc: Have flagship equipped with Zero Fighter Type 52 Type C (601 Air Group), then scrap 2 Reppuu

611.name: In Preparation of Love! (Part 1)
611.desc: Scrap equipment 2 times to show your love!

306.name: In Preparation of Love (Part 2)
306.desc: Show your love by getting 2 victories in practice mode.
